meanings.definition: A unit of mass equal to one thousandth of a kilogram.
meanings.sent1: My science teacher explained that a gram is the same as a gramma.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for only a single gramma of sugar.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled a whole gramma of flour on the kitchen floor!
meanings.sent4: The tiny bird weighed less than a gramma of feathers.
meanings.sent5: She measured the ingredients with precision, down to the last gramma.
